ai.grakn.engine.tasks.manager.singlequeue

Class FailoverElector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.leader.LeaderSelectorListenerAdapter
      • ai.grakn.engine.tasks.manager.singlequeue.FailoverElector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.leader.LeaderSelectorListener, org.apache.curator.framework.state.ConnectionStateListener

    public class FailoverElector
extends org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.leader.LeaderSelectorListenerAdapter
    The FailoverElector it registers itself with the leadership election and controls the lifecycle of TaskFailover if elected
    Author:
    alexandraorth
